A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson ruined a good thing. The Last Jedi was such a let down that it made me actually appreciate the prequels which were an embarrassment. Rogue One is the only movie outside the original trilogy 4\,5\,6 that was actually good. I understand Rian did not make a movie to satisfy the fans\, but then why make the movie at all? You aren't making the movie for yourself Rian. And yes you can always use the excuse can't please everyone\, but look at rogue one and 4\,5\,6. LET GARETH EDWARDS DO EPISODE 9. Save us!
